column4: I could really use some help here..  If I've installed libcups by typing "sudo apt-get install libcups2-dev libcupsimage2-dev"  How can I find the path which that's been installed to?
as i have something to compile that needs to be pointed to that path.. which in ubuntu 11 was /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu but that doesn't exist now
